page.title: 11 BRERETON GIRL'S LEISURE
page.content: In my leisure time I practise my recorder. I sometimes play on my sister's organ. I have a descant recorder and a tenor recorder. There are the same notes on both recorders and they are in the same places. I have a music stand to stand my music on. When I'm not playing the recorder or organ I listen to my radio or tape recorder. Most ofthe cassettes I listen to are the top 40. They have my favourite songs or songs I hate. I have one tape called "Christmas Carols from Westminster" and one with recorder playing and me singing on it. Sometimes I call for my friend or friends, then we tidy my shed and we play in there. On hot days I sometimes sun-bathe or have a water fight with my sister.
